title: New Transformational Class: Financial Peace
message: Our next Financial Peace class starts in February. Learn practical steps to budget, save, and get out of debt. Sign up through the app or call (503) 537-3999.

title: Volunteer Opportunity: Furniture Delivery
message: We need volunteers to help with a furniture delivery this Thursday afternoon. If you have a truck or can lend a hand, contact the office at (503) 537-3999.

title: Office Hours Reminder
message: Love INC Newberg is open Monday–Thursday, 10am–1pm. Call (503) 537-3999 or email info@loveincnewberg.org. We’re here to connect you with help.

title: Donation Need: Winter Coats
message: We’re accepting gently used winter coats for children and adults. Drop off at our office during open hours (Mon–Thu 10am–1pm) or at any of our partner church locations.

title: Impact Update: 500+ Families Helped
message: Thanks to our partner churches and volunteers, we’ve helped over 500 families in the Newberg area this year. Your support transforms lives. See Impact Stories in the app.

title: Gap Ministries: Connection Center Open Slots
message: The Connection Center has open volunteer slots for greeting and intake. Training provided. Serve once a week or on rotation. Reply or call the office to learn more.

title: New Church Partner: Welcome Springbrook Community
message: We’re excited to welcome Springbrook Community Church as a new Love INC partner. Together we’re mobilizing more churches to transform lives In the Name of Christ.

title: Holiday Office Closure
message: Our office will be closed December 24–25 for Christmas. We’ll reopen with normal hours (Mon–Thu 10am–1pm) the following week. For urgent needs, check with your local church or community resources.

title: Verse of the Day Now in App
message: Check the new Verse of the Day under More in the app. A fresh verse is available each day to encourage you.

title: Updated Donation Drop-Off Locations
message: Donate goods drop-off locations and hours have been updated. Open the Donate Goods section in the app to see current sites, what we accept, and when you can drop off.
